Jack likes hanging around but soon he grows tired of life at the preserve. Trying to liven things up, Julie, the caretaker, organizes a family vacation to Mexico. But then, Jack gets separated from the group and ends up on the wrong plane to Colorado!! Lost and confused, Jack meets up with Pete, a snowboarder, and his rocker brother Jay, who try to help Jack find his family.

After achieving international stardom, Tiny the adorable Yorkie joins the celebrity judges for the first-ever Pup Star World Tour. The judges each welcome their favourite contestant from around the world to the Pup Star pack, training them to compete for the new title of global pup star champion. India's Raji joins Team Growl, China's Ming joins Team Paw-Paw, Nigeria's Mobo joins Team Gnarley, and Mexico's dashing telenovela star Julio joins Team Tiny.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Tanesha Williams / Megan Stevens
programme.desc: Tanesha Williams doesn’t want to have to work for a living, she’d rather her fiancé foot all the bills.

programme.title: The Lion Queen Episode 1 – A Midwife To Lions
programme.desc: Andi Rive, a midwife from the city has fallen in love with the fifty lions at Glen Garriff Lion Re-serve. With her dedicated team of staff, family and volunteers Andi is tasked with keeping the struggling reserve afloat, fending off creditors, lawyers and hunters.

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: They look like us. They move like us. And very soon they will live among us. They are humanoid robots. Meet an astonishing group of humanoids, among them: iCub, the world's first baby robot, and REEM, the Service Robot, ready to be launched as a guide in public spaces. Get to know humanoids!

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: Mankind has always looked at nature to solve problems, taking a cue from the solutions that biological systems have refined through natural selection. In this episode we look at a robotic plant that mimics the mechanics of plant roots, and dive underwater to see robots inspired by fish.

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: By the year 2050, three quarters of the world’s population will live in urban areas. Looking at robotic systems being developed worldwide we can take a glimpse at the city life of the future. Private transportation with self-driving cars, our homes with automated systems - robots are in our future.

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: From brains to eyes, hands to legs, and deep down to the internal organs implants, prosthesis and rehabilitation are entering a new era potentially creating a new type of human being - The Bionic Man- in reality, not on retro TV. But what ethical concerns arise as we mix technology with biology?

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: In the future will we spend our leisure time with smart and sophisticated machines designed for fun - Entertainment Robots? Marvel at Mantis, a two ton insect and Tradinno, a giant fire-spitting dragon. Then take a seat and watch a mechanical actor and a robotic pianist perform.

programme.title: The blue realm
programme.desc: Shark Business unravels some of the mysteries surrounding sharks with controversial behaviorist Dr. Erich Ritter. You'll witness divers testing the limits of shark-human interaction outside of cages with dangerous sharks such as lemon, bull and even great white sharks!

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Redesign My Brain | Season 2 | Episode 1
programme.desc: In episode one, Help Me Adapt, Todd uses the latest science to train his brain to become more adaptable. To prove that it’s possible, he risks his life rock climbing blindfolded up a rock-face in Utah’s Moab Desert. He ascends the 120-metre corkscrew summit of the Ancient Art Tower, a feat never before attempted without sight, after only six weeks of training.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China | Season 1 | Episode 2
programme.desc: SerpentZA and Laowhy86 rack up the miles as they travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They spend the night in a themed sex hotel, explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Perils of Attraction S01 E05
programme.desc: Hubble adopts a new persona to root out a mole at Number 10, but his performance is perhaps too convincing, as he bewitches a new colleague and upsets his superior’s wife.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: A Watery Grave S01 E06
programme.desc: The Princess is on her hen do. Hubble is put in charge of security and loses her after an aggressive assault from a gaggle of hen-nighters. Soon there is another mysterious attack with a stone gargoyle. Hubble fears for his life and Yates is employed as his bodyguard. But strange things continue to happen...

programme.title: Soundtrack to Sixteen
programme.desc: Soundtrack to Sixteen is a coming-of-age film about two anxious teens growing up in London in the 2000s. Maisy is self-conscious and constantly overanalysing. She is obsessed with having her first kiss this year, before she turns seventeen, but stalking the boy next door doesn't seem to be working. Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

programme.title: Colossal Youth
programme.desc: Colossal Youth follows four friends Ryder (Troy Osterberg), Greg (Riker Lynch), Erica (Kimmy Caruso) and Jordan (Reese Everett Ryan) as they navigate life, love and the wild and crazy times of high school. Ryder is a hopeless romantic and when his dream girl obsession Siobhan (Alexa Dowd) returns to school he goes for broke trying to win her heart. His pursuits lead him to rock bottom, but it's there that he realizes his real love has been beside him all along.

programme.title: Melody Match Me: Melody Match Me
programme.desc: Meet Felicity King - a desolate introvert soul, seeking love and confidence. Her clumsy, geeky and nerdy nature is a formula for a disaster!

programme.title: Three Chen Sisters: Three Chen Sisters
programme.desc: Jennifer, the older sister struggles with singleness Amanda, the middle sister, deals with her lack of excitement in life and the youngest daughter tries to come to terms with her Chinese identity. Watch these three Chinese American women deal with their cultural identity and navigate their complicated lives through dating, career, school, and family in Southern California.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Perils of Attraction S01 E05
programme.desc: Hubble adopts a new persona to root out a mole at Number 10, but his performance is perhaps too convincing, as he bewitches a new colleague and upsets his superior’s wife.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: A Watery Grave S01 E06
programme.desc: The Princess is on her hen do. Hubble is put in charge of security and loses her after an aggressive assault from a gaggle of hen-nighters. Soon there is another mysterious attack with a stone gargoyle. Hubble fears for his life and Yates is employed as his bodyguard. But strange things continue to happen...

programme.title: Soundtrack to Sixteen
programme.desc: Soundtrack to Sixteen is a coming-of-age film about two anxious teens growing up in London in the 2000s. Maisy is self-conscious and constantly overanalysing. She is obsessed with having her first kiss this year, before she turns seventeen, but stalking the boy next door doesn't seem to be working. Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With the Blindfolded Knife Throw- Nathaan Phan stupefies actress and musician Alicia Witt with his magical knowledge of music. At CityWalk, Ed Alonzo puts a scare into an unwitting subject with his "skill" of knife throwing. Titou vanishes a wine bottle and Darryl Davis is all about the ring!

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: We catch up with The Beaches about new music touring with The Rolling Stones. Taylor Janzen talks about her new music and being thoughtful with her lyrics. Dylan Fraser performs and more.

programme.title: The World's Funniest Moments Hour
programme.desc: Top 5 Viral Videos of the week, a classic jib jab showdown between future president Barrack Obama and presidential candidate John McClain including a face off with VP hopeful Sarah Palin. Plus, stupid stunts and the John Ross $1000 Challenge in which John gets random people to do impossible tasks for money.

programme.title: Paris Trout
programme.desc: In a small Georgia town in the 1950s, bigoted store owner Paris Trout kills a young black girl when his brother refuses to pay his debts.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Sydney- Sydney Harbor, a sightseeing cruise followed by a fast jet boat ride that makes some exciting 360 spins under the Harbour bridge. Laura climbs to the top of the Sydney Harbour Bridge - a once-in-a-lifetime experience indeed - before she visits her favorite attraction, the legendary Sydney Opera House. Numerous first-rate attractions, world-class museums, excellent shopping, and a year-round calendar of free outdoor events.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Giving Back-Join Elizabeth Stanton and her celebrity friends in this very special episode of Great Big World as they travel to Vietnam, Africa, Nicaragua and Nevada on a life-changing voluntourism mission.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Paris- The Hotel des Invalides, where Napoleon is buried under the dome the Palace de Royales, the old royal palace, the famed Paris Opera House, and the Grand Dame of Gothic Architecture - Notre Dame Cathedral. Plus, the Musée Rodin, the Georges Pompidou Museum and the Musée National Picasso for fans of Modern Art, and, finally, The Louvre. - once the royal palace in France.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Magic and Illusion- Elizabeth Stanton and her friend and actor, Taylor Gray, discover life behind the scenes of the award-winning television series, Masters of Illusion! Witness daring escape, mind-blowing mentalists, incredible illusionists, levitations, transformations, and so much more, all performed live on stage in Hollywood!

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

programme.title: Curse of the Black Dahlia
programme.desc: A successful marketing executive working in a building erected on the very same lot where the mutilated body of a fallen actress was found back in 1947 is haunted by terrifying nightmares and vivid hallucinations in a dark thriller that brings Hollywood's darkest mystery screaming into the 21st Century.

programme.desc: From the plundering and confiscation of art from museums and collectors’ houses, to the 4 great exhibitions which take stock of the situation 80 years later, this investigative series examines what happened to Nazi-looted art treasures. Revealing how Hitler and Goering were both compulsive collectors, the 3-episode series retraces the dramatic stories of families involved at the time and the difficult recovery of artworks carried out over the last few decades.

programme.title: Shangku Shelter
programme.desc: Set in Zanskar, Indian Himalaya, Shangku Shelter is a story of two decades of adventure, friendship and social change, driven by a love of skiing. Zanskar is a remote kingdom in the northwest Indian Himalaya, where local people are snow-bound for six months of the year. About 10,000 Zanskaris live in the isolated valley. In winter, mountain passes are blocked, the summer Jeep road closes and buses stop. Two decades ago, three friends founded a ski school – to enable winter travel in the valley, improve quality of life, and to encourage young people to stay in Zanskar by helping establish a culture of mountain sports. The film tells the story of this friendship, the ski school and the development of skiing in the area. Along the way a bigger question is raised. Nomination Best Film - CMS Vatavaran Environment and Wildlife Film Festival 2019. Best Feature - Maine Outdoor Film Festival 2018. Environmental Spirit Award - Ottawa Adventure Festival 2018. Nominated Best Documentary - Silk Road International Film Festival 2018. Official Selection 2019: Calgary Mountain Film Fest. Official Selections 2018: Bansko Film Fest, XVI Mezinárodní Festival Outdoorových Filmů.

programme.title: The Adventurer: Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Transporting you to a rambunctious realm of enchanting fantasy. When Mariah's little brother is kidnapped, he follows a trail of clues to discover a hidden realm of monsters, ancient secrets and a long-lost artefact. Feat: Michael Sheen & Sam Neill.

programme.title: Saints And Soldiers 3
programme.desc: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

programme.title: Barely Lethal
programme.desc: While on a mission, Megan Walsh, an assassin, gets intrigued with the lives of the other teenagers who are her age. She decides to fake her own death and enrol herself in a school. Starring: Jessica Alba, Samuel L. Jackson, Sophie Turner, Jaime King

programme.title: Memoirs Of An Invisible Man
programme.desc: When a government experiment goes awry it renders an innocent bystander invisible.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: Mel Gibson ("Lethal Weapon") stars as a troubled husband and executive who adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

programme.title: 5to7
programme.desc: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening. Starring: Anton Yelchin, Bérénice Marlohe, Olivia Thirlby

programme.title: Good Enough
programme.desc: A comedic drama that follows New York City based flight attendant Lorna Flynn on her obsessive journey to find her long lost relative after her absent father passes away. Starring: AnnaRose King, Ted Tremper, Becky Yamamoto

programme.title: Sweet Home Carolina
programme.desc: Diane is a struggling single mom in LA. Just when things are at their worst, but she will have to live in small town USA for a year and take care of a dog for a year before the house is hers.

programme.title: Back To Love
programme.desc: A young widow returns home for the first time in three years to help prepare her sister's wedding. She is forced to confront her past, including the man she never expected to fall for.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: Samantha Mackenzie wants what every college freshman desires: to experience life away from home and parents. It's not going to be easy, however, because home for Sam is the White House, and her dad is the President of the United States.

programme.title: Die Welt

programme.title: Je criais contre la vie ou pour elle
programme.desc: In the forest, the herd of deer turns against the hound dogs that have been chasing them so far. From this unusual chase, new landscapes arise from the ground. This collage drama was made after an idea from a 19th century engraving.

programme.title: Stuck
programme.desc: A light and humorous exploration of one couple's marital problems.

programme.title: Iron Island
programme.desc: Some poor people in the Southern coasts of Iran do not have any place to live, and thus, they reside on an old, abandoned ship in the sea. Captain Nemat, their chief, tries to persuade the ship-owner and the official authorities not to get the ship back. On the other hand, he is selling the iron parts of the ship piece by piece. “Iron Island” is the story of those whose ignorance makes them simply trust those who are always ready to abuse their trust.

programme.title: Port Of Shadows
programme.desc: A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a smoky French port city.

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: A box-office hit (despite being banned in three states), SCARLET STREET is one of legendary director Fritz Lang’s (M, Metropolis) finest American films. When middle-aged milquetoast Chris Cross (Edward G. Robinson, Double Indemnity) rescues street-walking bad girl Kitty (Joan Bennett) from the rain-slicked gutters of an eerily artificial back-lot Greenwich Village, he plunges into a whirlpool of lust, larceny and revenge. As Chris’ obsession with the irresistibly vulgar Kitty grows, the meek cashier is seduced, corrupted, humiliated and transformed into an avenging monster before implacable fate and perverse justice triumph in the most satisfyingly downbeat denouement in the history of American film. Dan Duryea, as Kitty’s pimp boyfriend, skillfully molds “a vicious and serpentine creature out of a cheap, chiseling tin horn.” (The New York Times). Packed with hairpin plot twists and “bristling with fine directorial touches and expert acting” (Time), SCARLET STREET is a dark gem of film noir

programme.title: The Cortege
programme.desc: Capi is the oldest gravedigger in the cemetery. Used to working amidst the suffering of others and the jokes of his colleagues, there is only one person capable of taking him out of his daily routine. Every month for the last couple of years he has waited for Marta to take flowers to the grave of her husband. She is his last hope.

programme.title: Closer to God
programme.desc: A genetic scientist successfully clones the first human being, a baby girl named Elizabeth, but his work is soon threatened by a dark secret, a secret that threatens to destroy everything and everyone precious to him.

programme.title: The duel
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

programme.title: The Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: Kevin, Allen, and John are three recent college graduates who, several months after graduation, are still struggling to find work due to the recent economic downturn. When Kevin finds out that he and his family are about to be evicted from their home, he and his friends attempt to raise the money to save them from this fate, but their initial idea does not go as planned.

programme.title: Imaginaerum
programme.desc: A coma sends an old man into his childhood's sinister fantasy world, where he must fight dementia and gain back his memories before it's too late.

programme.title: 4 Minute Mile
programme.desc: A former track coach decides to train a student with natural athletic talent. Tragedy strikes, forcing the student to confront everything that has been holding him back.

programme.title: Jane Fonda
programme.desc: Watch the story of Jane Fonda, the famous American actress.

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe Part II
programme.desc: There is no actress as iconic as Marilyn Monroe. Let’s hear about her life.

programme.title: Twin Rivers
programme.desc: Two brothers are on a long journey across New South Wales, Australia in 1939. Travelling on foot, they trying to reach the city of Melbourne to start their own business. However, a series of events on the road lead them to the township of Riverton, where the brother's loyalty to each other is challenged when new dreams are discovered.

programme.title: Impact Spotlight
programme.desc: A collection of documentaries on the devastating impact caused by plastics in the ocean.

programme.title: Best Friends Forever
programme.desc: Jim faces his fears and a macho wrestler toy arcade prize is quick to judge the young girl trying to win him, plus much more in these animated short films.

programme.title: Discover Real Lives

programme.title: Discover Real Lives
programme.desc: A young Italian man embarks on a trip to China to meet his future wife's family and the story of boxer Rockin' Robin Deakin in these documentaries.

programme.title: Feet Up Drama
programme.desc: A young woman faces a challenge when she tries to get her first ever job at a cafe and a dancer finds an unlikely source of encouragement in this collection of drama short films.

programme.desc: The best of Italy in shorts, including dystopian Sci-fi, drama, and thrillers with a modern edge.

programme.title: Family Drama
programme.desc: Dramatic stories with broader and sometimes more accessible themes for everyone, this collection of shorts includes everything from family comedy, and animation to heavier hitting, gritty storytelling.

programme.title: Animation

programme.title: Voyage Stories
programme.desc: The films in this program are varied but each shares the theme of a voyage, or a journey whether physical, emotional, or literal, each one with strong characters and layered meanings.

programme.title: Romantic Comedy
programme.desc: Taking the serious topic of love and bringing humour, these romantic comedies explore the pain and pressure of relationships with lightness, laughter, and (generally) happy endings.

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Walter Zarrow is wounded during a mugging. In an effort to escape he rings buzzers indiscriminately, waking Sam, a middle aged father of two having an affair in the city. Sam reluctantly answers Zarrow's pleas, and Zarrow loses consciousness in his arms. Through an exploration of why these men, along with the mugger, and an addict named Joe, come together, we explore New York City. The experience of Zarrow, Sam, Joe and Zarrow's assailant ripple quickly out to include the connected lives of a housewife struggling with alcoholism, a stoner teen desperate to lose his virginity, a brilliant but failed writer fighting addiction, two parents confronting the prospect of terminal illness, and a brilliant grad student who wounds herself to feel alive.

programme.title: Discovering: Pinter
programme.desc: A personal take on working with Harold Pinter, one of the truly great modern playwrights in theatre and film. Featuring intimate conversations with actors, directors and writers on their experiences of the man and his work.

programme.title: Hail Mary!
programme.desc: What do you do when your pro football franchise have lost thirty two games in a row? Buy up a school of Japanese Sumo Wrestlers, with all of its gargantuan 600 plus pound Sumos and make them into linemen protecting your precious star quarterback, O'Rourke.

programme.title: The Penitent Man
programme.desc: The Penitent Man tells the story of psychologist Dr. Jason Pyatt, a man devoted to his work - a man torn from his family. With his struggling marriage and mounting bills, Jason is at a crossroads with the life he has chosen and the life he could have. When one of his clients - the mysterious Mr. Darnell - walks into his office and paints him a repentant tale of future economic and moral collapse, Jason's eyes are forever opened. With the help of his best friend Ovid, he embarks on a personal mission to change the course of his future, and possibly the world, forever.

programme.title: Adios Amigo
programme.desc: A conman's crimes are blamed on a good-natured fast-drawing cowboy he meets and decides to use as decoy.

programme.title: In Exile
programme.desc: An inspiring and heart-warming story of abandonment and reunification. A family friendly, colorful and intense experience aimed at a young audience that teaches the values of sacrificing ones own ambition to protect a loved one. Over 65 international festival screening worldwide.

programme.title: The World’s Greatest Baloon Adventures - Season 1, 1. The Alps
programme.desc: In this new five-part series we explore the world´s most fascinating landscapes with hot-air balloons. Breathtaking adventures await the balloonists in the endless vastness of the Gobi Desert, in the snow-covered mountain-sides of the Alps or at the steep rock faces of the Venezuelan Tepuis. Emotional human encounters, exotic cultural experiences and thrilling nature adventures are promising ingredients for a dynamic, exciting and entertaining series about the special life of ballooning enthusiast and their quest for the “Great Picture”.

programme.desc: This collection has got the lot: new, old, and all those in-between. Animation, comedy, love, drama, action, they’re all included to ensure that whatever your streaming tastebuds desire, there’s something to satisfy those cravings.

programme.title: Hello Carter
programme.desc: This witty, charming, feel-good comedy, stars Jodie Whittaker (Doctor Who) and Charlie Cox (Daredevil). Carter is a homeless, unemployed, single, twenty-something Londoner. Desperate to get his life back on track, he wants to win back his elusive ex-girlfriend Kelly (Annabelle Wallis), but learns that the road to happiness can be unpredictable, unconventional and unbelievably funny

programme.title: Into The White
programme.desc: The exceptional tale of when war took a back seat. Starring Rupert Grint (Harry Potter franchise), this heart-stopping, dramatic thriller is inspired by true events. Stranded in the wilderness of Norway after an aircraft battle, a group of German pilots reach an abandoned cabin. Followed shortly, by two British pilots. Now sheltering together for survival, will the soldiers put their enmity aside?

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Gladiator meets Game of Thrones in this electrifying epic starring Academy Award winner Morgan Freeman and Academy Award nominee Clive Owen. In an age of honour and justice by the sword Raiden is a fallen warrior who must rise up against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge Bartok, his dishonoured master.

programme.title: Deadly Isolation
programme.desc: Unsuspecting widow, Susan Mandaway (Sherilyn Fenn, Twin Peaks, Of Mice and Men) is left to face the unsavoury consequences of a robbery masterminded by her late husband. Frightened and alone, it is up to Susan to discover the truth and save herself from a from a deadly end.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: Legends Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken and William H. Macy, star in this slick and witty comedy crime caper. It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster. When three well-serving security guards discover that their most favourite artworks are being sent to another museum, they concoct a plan to switch the real masterpieces with fakes.

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 1-3
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a ButterFly Louie, Draw Me a Pig Louie, Draw Me a Tow Truck Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Alex - Season 1 - Episodes 47-52
programme.desc: Peach | Coconut | Eggplant | Fig | Grapes | Pumpkin Alex is a curious 5 year old boy who wants to learn from the world around him. programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 37-38
programme.desc: Little Fish Grow Up Runaway Robot Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

Relive the glory days of burlesque cartoons!

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 28-30
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a Yeti Louie, Draw Me a Cheetah Louie, Draw Me a Bear Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: Paul is a teenager caught up in the rave scene of 90s Paris, rubbing shoulders with future greats, Daft Punk. After forming a DJ duo of his own, Paul’s dedication to the music he loves sees him travel the world at the forefront of a musical revolution. But as the hedonism of his youth gives way to the reality of his advancing years, Paul must choose between his dreams and responsibilities.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Full of shock turns, moments of horrific injury, polar bear action and tense emotional scenes, Arctic will keep your hands clenched to your chair until its brilliant, breathless conclusion. Mads Mikkelsen gives a tour de force performance as a pilot whose plane has crashed in a remote corner of the Arctic. Stranded in the wilderness he uses his ingenuity to survive. When about to receive his long-awaited rescue, an explosive accident means his opportunity is lost and the dire situation further complicated. The tragic turn of events, involving another crash survivor forces the pilot to make a perilous choice between the relative safety of his camp and a deadly trek into the unknown.

programme.title: Life at These Speeds
programme.desc: We all have those memories. Indelible, perfect memories that make you glow with happiness. Like the way the sun shone off her hair the morning you met her or the sound of your best friend’s laughter after an inside joke or your coach’s inspiring speech or daydreaming with the love of your life about your future together. After a teenager's friends are killed in an accident, he finds running allows him to remember them perfectly. Running however also brings him notoriety. Soon he finds himself caught between keeping the past alive and making new memories in the present.

programme.title: A Kid Like Jake
programme.desc: Alex Wheeler (CLAIRE DANES) and her husband Greg (JIM PARSONS) are approaching a crossroads that is all too familiar to New York City parents - finding the ""right"" primary school for their son, Jake. Greg is a therapist working to build a private practice, while Alex has put a law career on hold to devote herself full-time to raising her son, a precocious four-year-old who happens to prefer Disney princesses to G.I. Joe. Aware that Jake has the potential to be a candidate for a scholarship at a private school, Jake's preschool director Judy (OCTAVIA SPENCER), a trusted friend of the family, encourages Alex to mention Jake's ""gender expansive"" play in their applications.

programme.title: 3 Hearts
programme.desc: One night in provincial France, Marc (Benoît Poelvoorde) meets Sylvie (Charlotte Gainsbourg) after missing his train back to Paris. Instantly and intensely drawn to one another, they wander through the streets until morning in rare, almost choreographed, harmony. A thwarted plan for a second meeting sends each in a separate direction - Sylvie reunites with her ex and leaves France Marc falls in love and marries. What neither knows is that Marc's new bride is Sylvie's sister, Sophie (Chiara Mastroianni).

programme.title: Planet Hulk (Marvel)
programme.desc: He was a monster, impossible to control, too dangerous to ignore. So Earth’s mightiest heroes exiled him into outer space. But now THE Incredible Hulk crash-lands on the distant planet Sakaar, ruled by the tyrannical Red King. Sold into slavery, the Hulk becomes the planet’s mightiest gladiator—but his new masters get more than they bargained for when he forges a bond of brotherhood with his fellow fighters. Unlike Earth, the desperate people of Sakaar believe a monster is just what they need. But will the Hulk be the one to save their world...or destroy it?

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard, Anti-Life) a New York City cop at rock bottom. But when he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together to save not only the life of the witness but his own as they are hunted across the city. The clock is ticking in this exhilarating race against time. Will justice be served or will there be two more bodies to add to the crime toll of the city?

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.

programme.title: Battle for Skyark
programme.desc: In the near future the earth has become desolate and dangerous. Now inhabited by by a mysterious race of creatures, humanity has been forced to find refuge in the Skyark, a man-made city in the sky. As the population grows, space becomes scarce and only the rich and powerful can stay, dumping the poor and orphaned of Skyark to the abandoned earth. Among them is one boy, Rags, the son of a fallen commander who is determined to save his fellow orphans and exiles. Together with his friends, he must battle through the ruins of old earth, fighting off the horde of alien monsters to return to Skyark and bring peace back to the people.

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...
